alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Coastal Atlantic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 14 at 3:31PM EST until December 16 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THURSDAY TO 4 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Delaware, Inland Sussex and Delaware Beaches. In New Jersey, Atlantic, Cape May, Atlantic Coastal Cape May and Coastal Atlantic. * WHEN...From 6 PM Thursday to 4 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong easterly winds will diminish and shift to the west overnight.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic; Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Coastal Atlantic
